author: kim Daniah
comment: Tanjiro is one of the best  protagonist I've ever seen in anime's nowadays. Despite the fact his family got slaughtered by a demon and his sister turned into a demon he didn't give up. He didn't let those things overcome him. He did his job as a demon slayer but still was kind to those demons because he knew they were humans before. And it shows that he's such a strong character. He showered all the demons with cindness even if he was on the brink of death. He helped so much people that he didn't even realize it. He did whatever it took to turn his sister back to a human. I don't know how ppl think he's a bad protagonist. Just be you watched a protagonist on another anime develop more or experienced worse doesn't mean anything. Tajiro was just a normnal and a kind boy before and thaÅ¥'s what the mangaka put him as. Not a protagonist that turns bad or angry all the time. ğŸ’œğŸ˜­
